smallPackage.title: Small Package
smallPackage.description: This small package of lights, perfect for those chill kick backs and small events.

mediumPackage.title: Medium Package
mediumPackage.description: This medium package is great for those medium size parties.

largePackage.title: Large Package
largePackage.description: This large lighting package is great for those big raggers when everybody shows up.

purpleGroundLight.title: Purple Ground Light
purpleGroundLight.description: This sweat ass purple ground light will produce some pretty chill light.

groundLight.title: Ground Light
groundLight.description: This small ground light will shoot some strong light out on the dance floor.

whiteHangLight.title: White Hang Light
whiteHangLight.description: Similar to the sweet purple ground light this one is white and a little bigger.

purpleLightBall.title: Purple Light Ball
purpleLightBall.description: Its time to get giggy with it, this purple light ball will make the party. Just try not to dance with this thing going.

whiteGroundLight.title: White Ground Light
whiteGroundLight.description: This rad white light hangs in the air shinning light down on you from above.

bigPurpleHangLight.title: Big Purple Hang Light
bigPurpleHangLight.description: Wow look at this amazing purple light, you know its going to be a party with this big boy.
